node.title: COVID-19 cases in NSW reproducing at the highest rate this year
node.alt: People sitting outdoors at a cafe
node.description: One infected person is on average passing COVID-19 onto another two, with an expert warning at this rate NSW could see case numbers doubling every four days.
node.content:
["NSW's COVID-19 cases are rising at the steepest rate\u00a0this year with every infected\u00a0person on average passing the\u00a0virus onto two other people.", "NSW and Victoria both recorded about\u00a01,700 COVID-19 cases on Thursday.", "On the face of it, the two states are on\u00a0level pegging, but another number tells a very different story.", "The effective reproductive rate -\u00a0the measure of how fast the virus is transmitting from one person to another -\u00a0is now above two in NSW, while in Victoria it is hovering just over one.", "It means that every positive case in NSW is transmitting the virus to two other people on average.", "Adrian Esterman, chair of biostatistics and epidemiology at the University of South Australia, said the number indicated\u00a0cases were growing \"at a very steep rate\".", "\"So with an effective reproduction number of about two, you're looking at case numbers doubling every four days,\" Professor Esterman said.", "NSW Health Minister Brad Hazzard said on Wednesday that modelling by UNSW suggested that with a reproductive rate of 1.5, cases could reach 25,000 a day by the end of January.", "However, he said the modelling was based on data from the UK and South Africa, which was not exactly analogous to the NSW situation.", "", "
Professor Esterman says it's a small number of people who cause most of the ongoing infections.(Supplied: University of South Australia)
", "Professor Esterman said a reproductive rate of two did not mean that every case transmitted\u00a0the virus to two others, but rather it was an average over all positive cases.", "\"There's a wide amount of variability, in the sense that it is a small number of people who cause most of the ongoing infections,\" he said.", "\"So 10 per cent of infected people caused eighty per cent\u00a0of infections.", "In practice, the majority of people infected no-one and just one or two others were superspreaders.\u00a0", "A superspreader event at The Argyle House nightclub in Newcastle on December 8 has resulted in at least 200 cases in one night.", "More than 600 cases were identified in the Hunter New England local health district on Wednesday.", "", "
At least 200 cases are linked to The Argyle House in Newcastle.(ABC News)
", "NSW Chief Health Officer Kerry Chant said on Wednesday that the Omicron variant was driving\u00a0the high reproductive rate, resulting in an uptick in cases.", "The total number of confirmed Omicron cases in NSW now stands at 122.", "Professor Esterman was critical of the NSW government's decision to push ahead with relaxed restrictions on mask-wearing, QR code check-ins and the rules for the unvaccinated.", "\"We know from Europe and other places that vaccination alone, no matter how high, will not\u00a0stop an\u00a0outbreak,\" he said.", "\"You need vaccination, plus some public health measures. And that's exactly what's happened\u00a0in New South Wales and Victoria until now.", "\"They both had quite strong public health measures and that's why it's been so stable.\"", "", "
Wearing masks helped to stop the spread of the virus in NSW but their use is no longer mandatory in some settings.(ABC News: Tim Swanston)
", "On Wednesday, Dr\u00a0Chant\u00a0urged people to keep wearing masks inside.", "\"It's a very tiny act, and you're actually protecting yourself, but more importantly, you're protecting others,\" she said.\u00a0\"You often don't know you've got COVID, and you're infectious,\" she said.", "NSW Health also changed the definition of a close contact on Wednesday, where only household contacts of a case and those who had been to a high risk venue\u00a0would need to isolate for seven days.", "Professor Esterman said an effective reproductive rate of about one meant case numbers were stable and below one meant the outbreak was dying out.", "The chart above shows how the effective reproduction rate fell during the NSW lockdown as vaccinations and\u00a0restrictions took effect.", "He said booster shots were one of the few ways to control the Omicron variant.", "\"If I was running the government, I'd\u00a0be reducing it down to a three month time period, because that's the minimum recommended by FDA,\" he said.", "Booster shots are currently recommended five months after the primary course\u00a0of vaccination.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
